alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Lafayette; Leon; Liberty; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:23PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lafayette, Wakulla, southeastern Liberty, southwestern Jefferson, Taylor, southern Leon, northeastern Franklin and Madison Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 423 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dowling Park to 12 miles west of Perry to 12 miles north of Carrabelle. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Carrabelle, Mayo, St. Marks, Perry, Madison, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Greenville, Sopchoppy, Lee, Pinland, Jewel Fire Tower, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Wakulla Springs, Eight Mile Pond, Panacea, Scanlon and Poplar Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida.
